table.name: ctmobile_address_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_address_modules` ( `module` varchar(250) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `active` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `sequence` int(3) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`module`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

table.name: ctmobile_address_fields
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_address_fields` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `module` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `fieldname` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=60 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

table.name: cte_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cte_modules` ( `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `valid` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`module`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

table.name: ctmobile_api_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_api_settings` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `api_key` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `order_no` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: ctmobile_license_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_license_settings` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `license_key` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `status` tinyint(3) DEFAULT NULL, `domain` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: ctmobile_license_settings
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `ctmobile_license_settings` ADD `expirydate` DATE NOT NULL AFTER `domain` , ADD `user_type` ENUM( 'free' , 'premium' ) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'free' AFTER `expirydate`

table.name: ctmobile_livetracking_users
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_livetracking_users` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1

table.name: ctmobile_access_users
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_access_users` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userid` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1

table.name: ct_address_lat_long
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ct_address_lat_long` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `recordid` int(11) NOT NULL, `moduleid` int(11) NOT NULL, `latitude` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `longitude` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 AUTO_INCREMENT=188

table.name: ctmobile_userderoute
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_userderoute` ( `id` int(12) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userid` int(11) NOT NULL, `devicetoken` longtext NOT NULL, `latitude` longtext NOT NULL, `longitude` longtext NOT NULL, `createdtime` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 AUTO_INCREMENT=1

table.name: ctmobile_userderoute
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `ctmobile_userderoute` ADD `record` VARCHAR( 200 ) NOT NULL AFTER `longitude` , ADD `action` VARCHAR( 200 ) NOT NULL AFTER `record`

table.name: ctmobile_access_users
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `ctmobile_access_users` CHANGE `userid` `userid` VARCHAR(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL

table.name: ctmobile_qrscanning
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_qrscanning` ( `qrscanningid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `module` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `modulefield` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`qrscanningid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1

table.name: ctmobile_qrscanning_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_qrscanning_modules` ( `module` varchar(250) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `active` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `sequence` int(3) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`module`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: ctmobile_qrscanning_fields
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_qrscanning_fields` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `module` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `fieldname` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: ctmobile_language_section
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_language_section` ( `section_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `section_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`section_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: ctmobile_language_keyword
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_language_keyword` ( `keyword_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `keyword` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL, `keyword_name` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL, `keyword_lang` varchar(10) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL, `language_keyword` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL, `sectionid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`keyword_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1

table.name: ctmobile_dashboard_sequence
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_dashboard_sequence` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `userid` int(11) NOT NULL, `type` varchar(100) NOT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: ctmobile_vcard_fields
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_vcard_fields` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `module` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `fieldname` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1

table.name: ctmobile_asset_field
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_asset_field` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `module` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `fieldname` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1

table.name: ctmobile_barcode_fields
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_barcode_fields` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `module` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `fieldname` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1

table.name: ctmobile_timetracking_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_timetracking_modules` ( `timetrackerid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `module` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`timetrackerid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1

table.name: ctmobile_routestatus
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_routestatus` ( `routestatusid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `routestatusname` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `routestatuslabel` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`routestatusid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1

table.name: ctmobile_routegeneralsettings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_routegeneralsettings` ( `routegeneralsettings_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `route_users` text NOT NULL, `route_distance_unit` varchar(100) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`routegeneralsettings_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1

table.name: ctmobile_signature_fields
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_signature_fields` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `fieldname` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `doc_type` enum('Signature','Documents') NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1

table.name: ctmobile_display_fields
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_display_fields` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userid` int(11) NOT NULL, `module` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `fieldname` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `fieldtype` enum('First Field','Second Field','Third Field') NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1

table.name: ctmobile_address_autofields
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_address_autofields` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `auto_search` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `street` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `city` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `state` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `postalCode` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `country` varchar(100) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1

table.name: ctmobile_calllog_autoactivity
ctmobile_calllog_users
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_calllog_users` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1

table.name: ctmobile_premium_feature
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_premium_feature` ( `feature_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `feature_name` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL, `feature_enabled` enum('0','1') CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`feature_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1

table.name: ctmobile_premium_feature
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_premium_feature` ( `feature_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `feature_name` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL, `feature_enabled` enum('0','1') CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`feature_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1

table.name: ctmobile_user_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_user_settings` ( `user_setting_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_setting_type` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL, `user_setting_value` enum('0','1') NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`user_setting_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1

table.name: ctmobile_notification_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_notification_settings` ( `notification_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `notification_type` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `notification_enabled` enum('1','0') NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `workflow_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `reminder_time` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `notification_title` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `notification_message` text DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`notification_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1

table.name: ctmobile_notification_module_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_notification_module_settings` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `modulename` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL, `notification_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `workflow_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1

table.name: ctmobile_notification_restriction
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ctmobile_notification_restriction` ( `restriction_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `notification_id` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`restriction_id`), KEY `user_setting_id` (`notification_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1

table.name: ctmobile_modules_management
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `ctmobile_modules_management` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `module` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1
